com.googlecode.aluminumproject.converters

Interface ConverterRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConverterRegistry

    public interface ConverterRegistry
extends ConfigurationElement
    A registry for converters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S> Object convert(S value, Type targetType)
      Convenience method that converts a value using one of the registered converters.

      Finds a converter that can convert values from a certain source type to a particular target type.

    • Method Detail

      • registerConverter

        void registerConverter(Converter<?> converter)
                       throws AluminumException
        Registers a converter and injects any of its fields that are annotated with @Injected with appropriate values.
        Parameters:
        converter - the converter to register
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the converter's fields can't be injected

      • getConverter

        <S> Converter<? super S> getConverter(Class<S> sourceType,
                                    Type targetType)
                                  throws AluminumException
        Finds a converter that can convert values from a certain source type to a particular target type.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the source type of the converter
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the type of the source values
        targetType - the type of the converted values
        Returns:
        a converter that can convert values from the given source type into the given target type
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when no converter can be found for the given types

      • convert

        <S> Object convert(S value,
                 Type targetType)
               throws AluminumException
        Convenience method that converts a value using one of the registered converters. It is required to handle null values.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the source type
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert (may be null)
        targetType - the type that the value should be converted into
        Returns:
        the converted value
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when no converter can be found for the source type or when something goes wrong while converting the value
